insertRandomValues.name: Insert 100 Random Value Rows to test table?
insertRandomValues.desc: Inserts 100 random values into the test table, for testing purposes.

initializeTestValues.name: [SANDBOX ONLY] Initialize test mode?
initializeTestValues.desc: ONLY CHECK THIS IF YOURE A DEVELOPER. Inserts some initial test values into most tables, creates some test files (like test images) in the frontend folders. There is no undoing this!
